title: Convert DWORD to REAL
description: This function takes an input of type DWORD and converts it into a REAL type. The function uses a pointer to achieve the conversion, ensuring that the value is correctly interpreted as a REAL number.
name: DW_TO_REAL

input.name: X
input.description: The DWORD input variable that needs to be converted to REAL.

return_value.description: The REAL value obtained from the conversion of the input DWORD.
